ActAppropriation Act No. 2, 1981-82
PrecisAppointment of MALCOLM BROWN of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Special Advisor to the Privy Council Office, to be styled “Special Advisor to the Clerk of the Privy Council on the Syrian Refugee Initiative”, to hold office during pleasure.
